tool_description: Get All NBA Sports Data API, Get All Teams, Players , Venues , Seasons and Awards API Data etc. All Listing Data and Information In our NBA API
name: NBA Listing
title: NBA Listing

api_list.name: NBA Awards
NBA Seasons by ID
NBA Seasons
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-listing1.p.rapidapi.com/nba-seasons/v1/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-listing1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
